column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I went out to my garage to get my bike to go on a ride .
#id=2
#text=When I saw my bike I realized that one of the tires were flat .
#id=3
#text=I needed to buy a new tube in order to fix the flat .
#id=4
#text=I drove to the local bike shop and purchased a tube that would fit my bike 's tire and then I drove back home .
#id=5
#text=I took the tube out of the packaging and read the instructions on how to put it on the bike .
#id=6
#text=I removed the tire from the bike and took out the old tube that was punctured .
#id=7
#text=I then inserted the new tube onto the tire .
#id=8
#text=I put the tire back on the bike and pumped up the tube with air until it was filled to the desired fill weight .
#id=9
#text=I got on the bike to test it and it was in great shape .
#text=Then I took off on my bike ride .
